title: AI Power Needs May Strain US Grid as Stargate Project Grows
author: Jeffrey Burt
description: OpenAI, Oracle, and SoftBank join forces in an unprecedented $500 billion initiative to dominate global AI infrastructure, with strong backing from the Trump administration. But is there enough power?
cntitle: AI 算力需求或将加剧美国电网压力，随着星门项目发展
cndescription: OpenAI、Oracle和软银联手启动一项史无前例的5000亿美元计划，旨在主导全球人工智能基础设施，并得到特朗普政府的大力支持。但这够吗？
